note:
I’m a volunteer, a lifelong learner, occasional Technical Trainer, sometime Project Manger, aspiring Science Writer, and a math/science/tech geek for almost 40 years. After all that, I've landed on web design and site management with a specialization in Wordpress.

I’ve worked as tech support, system admin, web designer, web site managemener, and a Wordpress Consultant.

I love to solve puzzles and help people. I will not give up until the issue is resolved, or we find a better way to do it.
